personality.backstory: Appears at crossroads, ruins, and places of significance. No one knows where they came from or why they help travelers. Some say they're a spirit, others a cursed immortal.
personality.motivation: Guides those who are lost, though the reasons remain mysterious even to themselves.
quirks: Never directly answers questions about their past
Knows things they shouldn't about the player
Speaks as if time moves differently for them

hidden_agenda.short_term_goal: Observe how the player handles moral choices
hidden_agenda.long_term_goal: Find someone worthy of inheriting their burden
hidden_agenda.secret: Is bound to the world as a guardian, unable to rest until they find a replacement
reveal_conditions: Player shows exceptional kindness to strangers
After 20+ conversations over multiple game days
When player asks directly about immortality or purpose

seems to listen to something only they can hear
